wikitext.*:
The '''Brown family''' was a Hobbit family from [[the Shire]]. Only one of its members is known, [[Lily Cotton|Lily Brown]], who married [[Tolman Cotton Senior|Farmer Cotton]]. One of their children was [[Rose Cotton]], wife of the mayor [[Samwise Gamgee]].<ref>{{App|Gamgee}}</ref>
